msbt.message: Heya, .Someone's been wantin' to catch you alone today so they can talk to you.There's a fun reason for it, so make sure to come back today when you're by yourself, .
Gonna be with for much longer?'Cause there's someone hopin' to catch alone here today.They don't wanna intrude on you two now. Can you ask your pal to stop by alone later today, ?
